attributes.action: To provide financial support to parents whom elective home educated
attributes.additional_details: Financial help is provided in schools through materials  free school meals and support with trips and local authorities supply transport and feel supplying funds would make it fair to access more opportunities which they may not be able to access being home educated
attributes.background: To help families financially when choosing to provide an education to there children vi's elective home education

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592327
